LanguageData.OE_Trophy_Grimoire_Worker_Aura.label: Aura of Reconstruction
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_Grimoire_Worker_Aura.descripti: This person is using a Grimoire of Reconstruction. Everyone within an effect radius gains working stats bonuses.
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_Grimoire_Worker_AuraBuff.label: Aura of Reconstruction
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_Grimoire_Worker_AuraBuff.descr: Someone is using the Grimoire of Reconstruction nearby, boosting this person's working stats bonuses.
